content: whether you are poolside relaxing on a beach or working in the garden this cotton sun sun hat will protect you from the sun and keep your head cool so… let the sun shine don t miss a thing subscribe to my free newsletter 1 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 2 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 3 join our community of crocheters and have fun 1 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 2 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 3 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/
